content: these charming eggs are a wonderful way to celebrate easter knit seamlessly in the round from the top to the bottom they re a quick and fun knit make for a child s easter basket or for decorating your home to celebrate spring s arrival this pattern calls for one color per egg but they also look great with color work i ve included photos that show the eggs with basic color work techniques stripes stranding have fun with these and snazz them up to your heart s content yarn four skeins rowan baby merino silk dk one in each color candy pink sunshine yellow iceburg aqua frosty lavender *note you can make several eggs from one skein of yarn so you can use as many or as few colors as you d like tools 32 circular needle size us 3 3 25mm or double points one stitch marker tapestry needle enough wool stuffing for 4 eggs i like wool bolus but any wool stuffing will do
